TextBlock.Text: OKALIS: Do you suppose our friends on the first and second pods survived?
AZOLLA: Karenia was unable to ascertain what became of the rest of our clan, which indicates they at least escaped the <color=purple>Bramble</color>.
SENNETTI: Do you suppose they may be able to locate us? Our makeshift warp setup should still be intact. Perhaps they will find us.

NESIA: Sennetti, anybody who may have survived the crash has certainly made the reasonable assumption that we all perished as well. As such, they will certainly be unwilling to return to the <color=purple>Bramble</color>. We are on our own.
AZOLLA: Don't lose hope, friend. They are our clan, we cannot so completely assume they would abandon us entirely.

NESIA: Stop it Azolla! We have been in the <color=purple>Deep Bramble</color> for months now! At this point, the rest of our clan has certainly concluded that, if we had survived, we would have found a way out of the <color=purple>Bramble</color>. Nobody is coming for us, and the idea that we can locate an exit the others have neglected for thousands of years is completely nonsensical!
SENNETTI: ...I apologize for mentioning this topic.
